external_games.name: Monster Girl and the Mysterious Adventure: Remastered Edition

name: Monster Girl and the Mysterious Adventure: Remastered Edition
summary: A refined remaster of the game originally released in March 2020, featuring enhanced graphics and improved systems. All graphics, including characters, dungeons, items, and UI, have been completely revamped.
